attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The House of Lords should be abolished for the following reasons: 1) The people elect members of the House of Commons and not the House of Lords - who do the people vote for?, 2) Save the tax payer hundreds of £millions/year in salaries to non-elected representatives, 3) removal of the by-right membership of 26 archbishops, 4) removal of a non-elected body of people influencing State policy, 5) removal of the "The Lords" upperclass influence on State policy, 6) removal of  another layer of corruption, etc, etc, etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
